thread.title: 5 Takeaways From the ECB’s Policy Announcement

author: Paul Hannon
title: 5 Takeaways From the ECB’s Policy Announcement
text:
Ahead of the European Central Bank’s second policy meeting of the year, the big question for investors was whether it would drop a pledge to increase bond purchases if the outlook for inflation worsens. In the days following U.S. President Donald Trump’s announcement of tariffs on steel and aluminum imports, such a move seemed less likely, given the risk to growth.
But in the end, ECB President Mario Draghi delivered the change in language, which marked a small but significant step toward scaling back its large monetary stimulus,...
